name: A Song in the Dark: Bard 16 / Rogue 14 / Pale Master 10
author: KailPendragon

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
This is the result of going more bard starting from the concept of the Pale Sneaker of Doom - Paler Sneaker of Doom of an Epic Dodging Crit Immune fella. We get a well playable dexer with access to bardic spells (and Craft Wand) and lvl 16 bard/curse song, in addition to keeping a nice SA figure, PM immunities, epic trapping skills and a nice AC figure. Here dual wield has been dropped for KD/IKD but it can be put back in, if desired.

Advantages
• Acceptable AB figure, with good ways to buff up
• Nice AC
• Epic Dodge (lvl 27)
• Full bardic spell slots
• Bard/Curse Song 16th lvl

• Craft Wand

Weaknesses

• Delayed bard song maturity
• Delayed spell slots maturity

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: Kail, you seem a bit tight on skill points there, why not toss the stealth skills and use invisibility? That way you'd free up loads of skill points to max out Taunt, UMD.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Maximillian Kane wrote:Kail, you seem a bit tight on skill points there, why not toss the stealth skills and use invisibility? That way you'd free up loads of skill points to max out Taunt, UMD.
That's a possibility. As I said elsewhere, stealth has a practical advantage over invisibility but if one i swilling to renounce to it then the skillpoints are there. Taunt is nearly maxed out and UMD 30 is often enough. Anyhow, everybody fix the skillpoints distribution as it better suits you.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Thanks, Master Conlaoch. I'm sure you'll have fun playing it on WoG.

Regarding available (and finesseable for a halfling) melee weapons:
  • Mace is ok because of blunt damage (and I have a soft spot for maces as real weapons).[/*:m]
  • Handaxe is good because slashing (can be keened) and x3 crits.[/*:m]
  • Dagger and shortsword are good because of crit range (and good availability on WoG in your case).[/*:m]
  • Sickle is a 20/x2 slashing weapon and as such it's inferior to handaxe.[/*:m]
[/list]

Of course the ranged backup is sling.
